My professional experience - Public speaking

October 12, 2015, Agile Nacht, Stuttgart, Germany

German consulting company mITblick invited me to sit on the bar with their CEO Marco Klemm and talk about leadership from the bottom. Saved PDF of the event.

October 6, 2015, Manage Agile, Berlin, Germany

Hosted the track "How to ..." at the two day conference Manage Agile.

September 14, 2015, Agile Prague, Prague, Czech Republic

Did a session on Enterprise reorganization from the bottom up.

Mai 29, 2015, Freiräume 2015, Hannover, Germany

Public talk in German about Coaching zukünftiger Meister (Coaching Future Masters).

August 29, 2014, Huawei Technologies Ltd., Xian, China

How to do ATDD with Specification by Example as a 60 minutes presentation in English with simultaneous translation into Mandarin

June 24, 2014, Huawei Technologies Ltd., Beijing, China

Acceptance Test-Driven Development as a 60 minutes presentation in English with simultaneous translation into Mandarin

March 4 - 7, 2013, Agile Dev Practices, Potsdam/Berlin, Germany

Activity-Centered Design: Smarter software through better understanding of what people want to do through software as a 45 minutes presentation in English.

November 29 - 30, 2012, XP Days Benelux, Heeze, Netherlands

Activity-Centered Design: Smarter software through better understanding of what people want to do through software as a 60 minutes presentation in English.

November 22, 2012, Agile Rhein-Main, Wiesbaden, Germany

Smarter Software with Activity-Centered Design as a 60 minutes presentation in German.

August 29 - 31, 2012, ALE 2012, Barcelona, Spain

Deeper Understanding of User Stories Through Activity Theory as a 60 minutes presentation in English.

July 6 - 7, 2012, Stoos Stampede, Amsterdam, The Netherlands

Organisational culture and the influence by tools on it as a 60 minutes presentation.

Intrinsic motivation based on 4 Drive Theory as a 60 minute session.

Language: English

June 21, 2012, Agile Roots 2012, Salt Lake City, USA

Activity-Centered Design as a 45 minutes presentation.

Language: English

June 4, 2012, SF Agile 2012, San Francisco, USA

Deeper Understanding of User Stories Through Activity Theory as a 60 minutes presentation and mini workshop.

September 2009, I Congreso Iberoamericano de Conocimiento Libre, Panama City, Panama

Presented in Spanish language about Agile and Scrum/XP

September 2008, IEEE Panama (Universidad Tecnologica de Panama), Panama City, Panama

Presented about Agile Development in Spanish language at an IEEE Panama organized event called Dia del Programador.

December 2007, Primer Congreso Panama JUG, Chitre, Panama

Presented in Spanish language about Scrum and our new product Savila at Primer Congreso Panama JUG which was the first event of this kind in Panama.

November 2007, Tampa JUG, Tampa, USA

Agile Development Organization as a 60 minutes presentation in English.

November 2007, Miami JUG, Miami, USA

Agile Development Organization as a 60 minutes presentation in English.

November 2007, Atlanta JUG, Atlanta, USA

Software Development in Panama as a 60 minutes presentation in English.

February 2007, 4th Geek Fest, Panama City, Panama

I was talking in Spanish about Scrum at a gathering of Panamanian software developers.

Want to leave me a comment? Please write to sns@caimito.net. Thanks!

About me

Hello! My name is Stephan Schwab.

As International Software Development Coach and Consultant I help CEOs and Department Leaders to improve value creation and cohesion within their organization. The outcome will be higher quality, customer delight and more revenue.

Learn about my professional experience since 1986.
